name: Publicly GCP Buckets
query: { buckets( where: { cloudProvider: "gcp" publicAccessBlocked: false hasIAMPolicy_SOME: { hasBucketIAMPolicyBinding_SOME: { OR: [ { members_INCLUDES: "allUsers" } { members_INCLUDES: "allAuthenticatedUsers" } ] role: { OR: [ { includedPermissions_INCLUDES: "storage.objects.get" } { includedPermissions_INCLUDES: "storage.objects.list" } { includedPermissions_INCLUDES: "storage.objects.create" } { includedPermissions_INCLUDES: "storage.objects.delete" } { includedPermissions_INCLUDES: "storage.objects.update" } { includedPermissions_INCLUDES: "storage.objects.*" } { includedPermissions_INCLUDES: "storage.objects.setIamPolicy" } { includedPermissions_INCLUDES: "storage.multipartUploads.create" } { includedPermissions_INCLUDES: "storage.multipartUploads.*" } ] } } } } ) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory contentHash } }
